properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 2:01PM PST until January 28 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...SNOW DEVELOPING THIS EVENING AND OVERNIGHT...

* WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations 4
to 8 inches above 3000 feet. Slushy wet accumulations up to 2
inches possible below 3000 feet.

* WHERE...Mullan, Dobson Pass, and Lookout Pass.

* WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will fall through the
evening hours.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET
